resources.string: Geo Tracker is a unique solution that provides you the capability of knowing the places you have been to while helping you browse through these locations in a fancy manner

To start tracking, click on the "Start Tracking" button, when you are ready to stop tracking just click on "Stop Tracking" button. To set the time you have to spend at a particular location before location will be recorded, hold and drag the white circular button to set your desired time.
To view tracking history click on the navigation bar at the top right corner. Tracking history is sorted by date and location
